longBusinessSummary: Medico Remedies Limited develops, manufactures, and sells pharmaceutical and nutraceutical products in India. The company offers antibiotics and anti-infectives; beta-lactams-penicillins and cephalosporins; antifungals; vitamins and supplements; cardiovascular products; antipyretic, analgesic, and NSAIDs medicines; antacid and anti-ulcer drugs; antidepressants, antipsychotics, and anti-epileptics; antimalarials; dry syrups; ointments and creams; anti-diabetics; syrups; and miscellaneous products, as well as diuretics, antireterovirals, and steroidal preparations. It exports its products. Medico Remedies Limited was incorporated in 1994 and is based in Mumbai, India.
